member.name: CMSG_CTRL_MAIL_LIST_DECRYPT_PARA
member.summary: The CMSG_CTRL_MAIL_LIST_DECRYPT_PARA structure contains information on a mail list message recipient.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_MAIL_LIST_DECRYPT_PARA.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this data structure.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_MAIL_LIST_DECRYPT_PARA.hCryptProv
member.summary: The provider used to do the recipient key encryption and export. If hCryptProv is NULL, the provider specified in is used.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_MAIL_LIST_DECRYPT_PARA.dwRecipientIndex
member.summary: Indicates a specific recipient in any array of recipients.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_MAIL_LIST_DECRYPT_PARA.dwKeyChoice
member.summary: Indicates the member of the following union that will be used. Currently only CMSG_MAIL_LIST_HANDLE_KEY_CHOICE is defined.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_MAIL_LIST_DECRYPT_PARA.DUMMYUNIONNAME.hKeyEncryptionKey
member.summary: Handle of the key encryption key. Used with dwKeyChoice set to CMSG_MAIL_LIST_HANDLE_KEY_CHOICE.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_MAIL_LIST_DECRYPT_PARA.DUMMYUNIONNAME.pvKeyEncryptionKey
member.summary: A pointer to a void. Reserved for future use.
